## Hypothesis
What do you think will happen?

## Experiment Setup
- Area: Agent / MCP / RLS / Model / Deployment
- Mode:
  - [ ] Copilot Agent Mode
  - [ ] Manual

## Steps
High-level steps to run the experiment.

## Observations
What actually happened?

## Outcome
- [ ] Confirmed hypothesis
- [ ] Disproved hypothesis
- [ ] Inconclusive

## Key Insight
What did this teach you about agentic systems?

## Decision
- [ ] Keep change
- [ ] Revert
- [ ] Follow-up experiment

## Learning Log
- [ ] Entry added to `LEARNING_LOG.md`
